code: import React from"react";import"./Navbar.scss";import{ImCart}from"react-icons/im";import logo from"../../Assets/leafOne.svg";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{useSelector}from"react-redux";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Navbar=function Navbar(_ref){var click=_ref.click;var cart=useSelector(function(state){return state.cart;});var cartItems=cart.cartItems;var getCartCount=function getCartCount(){return cartItems.reduce(function(qty,item){return qty+Number(item.qty);},0);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"navbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"navbar__logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{className:"logo-name",to:"/",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Horty"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cart-link-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"navbar__links",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"first-li",style:{background:"#004C40",padding:"10px 14px",borderRadius:"15px",color:"#fff"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{style:{color:"#fff"},className:"shop",to:"/",children:"Products"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"about anchor",to:"/about",children:"About"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"contact anchor",to:"/contact",children:"Contact"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"cart-btn",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{className:"cart-icon",to:"/cart",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ImCart,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"cartlogo__badge",children:getCartCount()})]})})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hamburger__menu",onClick:click,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{})]})]});};export default Navbar;
